description: OAuthAccessToken describes an OAuth access token

expiresIn.description: ExpiresIn is the seconds from CreationTime before this token expires.

scopes.description: Scopes is an array of the requested scopes.

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents. Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to. Cannot be updated. In CamelCase. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

refreshToken.description: RefreshToken is the value by which this token can be renewed. Can be blank.

userName.description: UserName is the user name associated with this token

authorizeToken.description: AuthorizeToken contains the token that authorized this token

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object. Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and may reject unrecognized values. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/api-conventions.md#resources

userUID.description: UserUID is the unique UID associated with this token

redirectURI.description: RedirectURI is the redirection associated with the token.

clientName.description: ClientName references the client that created this token.
